title: Install MacOS Sierra Developer Preview
description:
MacOS Sierra 10.12 

Developer Preview (Installer) 

Publication type: Installer
The release took place: 13.06.2016
Build number: 16A201w
Interface language:  English, and other

System requirements:
â€¢ 64-bit, Intel-based Mac
â€¢ OS X 10.6.8 Snow Leopard or higher
â€¢ A minimum of 2 GB of memory
â€¢ 8 GB of free disk space
â€¢ Some features require Apple ID; requires compliance with.
â€¢ Some features require a compatible Internet service provider; fees may apply.
â€¢ To use the functions Continuity (Handoff and AirDrop) requires a compatible Bluetooth LE (4.0)

Supported Models:
iMac: late 2009 or later
MacBook: late 2009 and later
MacBook Air: late 2010 or later
MacBook Pro: mid 2010 or later
Mac Mini: mid 2010 and newer
Mac Pro: mid 2010 or later


Description:
Sierra macOS (version 10.12) is the thirteenth major update of the desktop platform for Mac computers . 
It is the successor to OS X Mavericks. Sierra on macOS computers, from Apple becomes available for the 
first time Siri voice assistant. The computer will automatically unlock with the smart watches Apple Watch.
Another significant new feature is the universal clipboard, which will allow you to automatically copy text, 
photo and other content for your iPhone, and insert it already on the Mac. 
Apple rebranded OS X operating system for Mac, and changed its name on macOS, closer to users.

Features


The main feature of the new macOS is support voice control using Siri, 
migrated to the big screen with the Junior system Apple â€” iOS. It is on the audio input emphasized Craig Federighi,
 because most of the time he talked about all the features of Siri.
The voice assistant is able to send messages, search for photos, music and even learned how to find 
and play the video in a small window. This was the second feature of the system that you proudly called
 Picture in Picture. The ability to play video over other apps were previously only available on the iPad,
 but now it will be able to use a Mac â€” works even in full screen mode.

In parallel with updating Photos in iOS 10, Apple has added the ability to use all the new features apps
 and on the Mac. Now search and organize your photos is much simpler, and the program has a special tab
 Memories, is very similar in functionality with Google Photos Assistant and also an interesting feature 
â€” search for pictures faces.

An interesting novelty is the possibility to unlock the Mac using the Apple Watch to do this,
 just to "Wake up" the computer, lifting the cover of the display or moving the mouse, and sync 
will do the rest for you. Apple claims that the feature works immediately, so the password will
need to think only if there are no Watch.

An indirect feature of the system can be called also support Apple Pay for web. To make purchases 
on the Internet, you can use a Mac+iPhone/Watch. To confirm you need only to touch the Touch ID on 
your smartphone or double-click on the side switch of the Apple Watch.
The company also showed a new clipboard works with the iPhone and Mac. Function allows you to copy
and paste images, text, and video on both devices, and, Apple claims, should lead the interaction 
with the Mac to a new level. As an example, the company has shown the ability to copy the recipe with
 the right ingredients, Mac and paste it directly to your shopping list on your iPhone.
iCloud Drive now works differently. Apple got back to your own cloud service and this time seriously,
 the desktop and the Documents folder on the Mac can now automatically copied to the cloud, and all of
 your saved Mac files to be available on all devices tied up. Convenient, but expensive, considering 
that the free storage is limited to 5 gigabytes.

While Craig Federighi talked about the new auto-cleaning system of the store, which will do a backup 
infrequently used files to iCloud, and will also help you find the garbage, and clean the cache.

Installation procedure:


Update:
Mount the downloaded image
Rewrite Install 10.12 Developer Preview.app to the applications folder and run the installer 
(double click on the file "Install 10.12 Developer Preview.app")

Installing on a separate partition on the hard drive:
To install macOS 10.12 Sierra, we need to partition the drive the computer into multiple partitions. 
To do this, go into disk utility, select hard drive, then the tab "Partition", 
and add a new one by clicking on the plus. Call it, for example, Macintosh HD. It is recommended 
to allocate Sierr'have at least 12 GB or better 15 GB.

Mount the image and move the setup application in the directory "Program" and it immediately launched.

A menu will appear that will prompt you to choose which hard drive partition to install 
macOS 10.12 click on Sierra, and then the installation will run automatically. Upon completion of
 the installation the system reboots and starts up with the help of Sierra.

 How to switch between two installed on the computer operating systems? It is enough to restart the 
Mac before booting the system hold the Option (alt), after which you will be able to choose their
 old system
